import React,{useState,useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{CartContext}from'../../Context/CartContext';import{AuthContext}from'../../Context/AuthContext';import{useDarkMode}from'../../Context/DarkModeContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PaymentGateway=()=>{const{cartItems}=useContext(CartContext);const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const{isDarkMode}=useDarkMode();const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Redirect if no user or cart items
if(!user){navigate('/login');return;}if(!cartItems||cartItems.length===0){navigate('/cart');return;}},[user,cartItems,navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen ".concat(isDarkMode?'bg-gray-900 text-white':'bg-gray-50 text-gray-900'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-2xl mx-auto text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-8",children:"Payment Processing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"".concat(isDarkMode?'bg-gray-800':'bg-white'," rounded-lg shadow-md p-8"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg mb-6",children:"Payment processing has been integrated into the checkout flow."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/checkout'),className:"px-6 py-3 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors",children:"Go to Checkout"})]})]})})});};export default PaymentGateway;
